description: G.f. is 1 - 1/f(x), where f(x) = 1+x+3*x^2+9*x^3+32*x^4+... is 1/x times g.f. for A063020.
comments: Number of maximal independent sets in rooted plane trees on n nodes.
links: M. Klazar, Twelve countings with rooted plane trees, European Journal of Combinatorics 18 (1997), 195-210; Addendum, 18 (1997), 739-740.
Index entries for sequences related to rooted trees
formula: a(n+1) = sum(k = 1..n, binomial(n+k,k)/(n+k)*sum(j = 0..k, binomial(j,n-k-j+1)*binomial(k,j)*(-1)^(n+k-j+1)),k,1,n)+C(n), where C(n) is a Catalan number. - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Nov 13 2014Recurrence: 16*(n-1)*n*(2*n-3)*(17*n^2 - 81*n + 96)*a(n) = (n-1)*(1819*n^4 - 14124*n^3 + 40377*n^2 - 50320*n + 23040)*a(n-1) + 8*(2*n-5)*(4*n-11)*(4*n-9)*(17*n^2 - 47*n + 32)*a(n-2). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 14 2014Asymptotics (Klazar, 1997): a(n) ~ sqrt(5731-4635/sqrt(17)) * ((107+51*sqrt(17))/64)^n / (256 * sqrt(Pi) * n^(3/2)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 14 2014
prog: (PARI) x='x+O('x^66); Vec(1-x/serreverse(x-x^2-x^3+x^4)) \\ _Joerg Arndt_, May 28 2013(Maxima)a(n):=sum(binomial(n+k,k)/(n+k)*sum(binomial(j,n-k-j+1)*binomial(k,j)*(-1)^(n+k-j+1),j,0,k),k,1,n)+1/(n+1)*binomial(2*n,n); // _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Nov 13 2014
author: Martin Klazar (klazar(AT)kam.mff.cuni.cz), Mar 15 1996
